name: Stage 3: Azaria
description: Enter a Fantasy VR world in Stage 3 Azaria, an FPS where you control a powerful Archmage, who is the only survivor after a royal meeting that ended up in betrayal and mass murder. Use your power and blast your enemies as you protect Heorogan's castle from the siege of Eolica's army.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i7 6700k or AMD Ryzen5 1600X Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space
